page.title: 05BRENDON HILL FARM
page.content: Education The area has no local schools. The children of primary school age attend Wheddon Cross Primary school situated approximately 9 miles away.The children have to be taken by car or minibus every day. Older children may attend Dulverton or Minehead middle schools, both of which are a fair distance away, going to the comprehensive in Wiveliscombe at 11. Some children attend private schools in the County town, Taunton or in the surrounding area. These schools are over 20 miles away but are possible if transport can be provided. Communications are poor in the area. There is no bus service or railway at all. Personal transport must be provided in order to get anywhere.
